title: Short and sweet review of gallium. For some reason I find this really funny.
author: ZincHead

comments.author: samkostka
comments.body: It's actually really fun to play around with if you buy it.

comments.author: HappyRectangle
comments.body:
I want to see someone go around and give a review for every chemical element.

Carbon -- absolutely essential. A million uses. 5 stars

Gold -- dazzling color and totally resistant to corrosion, but really, $15k for a pound? 3 stars

Thullium -- I could not find a use for this at all. 1 star
